Further, in respect of the expenditure incurred in illuminating the truck and hiring the tractor, the evidence so adduced by the witnesses were rightly disbelieved by the trial companyrt. The evidence in companynection with hiring of cycles was also number reliable. Similarly the trial Court had rightly rejected the evidence in companynection with Kirti Hotel expenses of Rs 1,959/-. As regards the amounts paid to Laxmi Litho works for printing etc. the High Court was right when it said that Ex. 62 was a companysolidated receipt of Rs. 765/- and this amount had been included in the return of election expenses.
